name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Fullstack Python Developer with over 10 years of experience in **Python** programming, specializing in both backend and frontend development. Proven capability in designing and implementing high-quality web technologies, including creating high-performing APIs and scalable services. Proficient in collaborating within dynamic team environments to deliver impactful solutions. Well-versed in using **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask** for backend development, with a solid understanding of integration with frontend technologies. Committed to leveraging cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure** to enhance application performance, bringing expertise from successful projects at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to develop and maintain robust backend services, leveraging **FastAPI** for enhanced document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Engineered scalable frontend solutions and integrated them with backend services to deliver a seamless user experience in a collaborative environment.
Implemented event-driven architectures with **Celery** and **Redis** for managing asynchronous processing of over **5000** financial transaction requests daily.
Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, achieving **99.9% uptime** and ensuring smooth cloud operations.
Created and maintained complex data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, optimizing data flow for over **200** regulatory reports monthly.
Led security assessments and successfully integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, enhancing authentication systems to support user growth and compliance for over **10,000** users.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve intricate system integration challenges, guaranteeing compliance with industry standards and overseeing release strategies with an emphasis on agile methodologies.

• Developed robust **backend systems** utilizing **Python** and **FastAPI**, enhancing document workflows and improving user onboarding processes for over **500** users.
• Engineered **event-driven microservices** with **Celery** and **Redis**, facilitating asynchronous processing of financial data and handling over **1,000** transaction requests per minute.
• Managed seamless deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring a **98%** uptime and consistent operations.
• Designed and implemented secure **data pipelines** for regulatory data exchange, utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and efficiently manage the data flow across **3** major departments.
• Conducted thorough **security audits** to maintain compliance with industry standards, and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication and securing access controls for over **10,000** users.
• Fostered a collaborative environment by working alongside cross-functional teams to facilitate smooth system integration and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, contributing to successful release management on **7** major projects.

- **Backend Development**: Developed backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.
- **Real-time Web Technologies**: Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, processing over **1000 transactions per second**.
- **Collaborative Environment**: Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform, resulting in a **30% increase** in user satisfaction ratings.
- **Regulatory Compliance**: Ensured the platform met regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while adhering to internal data security protocols to maintain compliance scores over **95%**.
- **Quality Assurance**: Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles, reducing bugs by **40%**.
- **Task Optimization**: Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management, improving task completion times by **25%**.
